duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain clean, attractive, and orderly guest rooms, hallways, and public areas in the hotel in accordance with hotel procedures.
Service guest rooms daily, stocking carts with room supplies, replacing bed linens, and replenishing guest room supplies while adhering to company standards and safety/security procedures.
Conduct 'deep cleaning' activities within the guest rooms in conjunction with preventative maintenance tasks as required.
Maintain regular attendance and high standards of personal appearance and grooming in compliance with hotel standards.
Perform thorough cleaning and restocking of the required number of guest rooms per shift.
Complete all pre-cleaning duties, including guest supplies, cleaning supplies, and linen for housekeeping cart set-up.
Remove all trash and dirty linen from guest rooms and perform other tasks as assigned by the supervisor or manager.

May be required to disassemble furniture or items in the guest room to conduct deep cleaning, and perform deep cleaning tasks such as changing the AC filter, cleaning the AC coils, touching up paint on walls/molding, and touching up scratched furniture or rehanging closed slide doors.
